original_text: And she shall take off the clothes in which she was captured and shall remain in your house and lament her father and her mother a full month. After that you may go in to her and be her husband, and she shall be your wife.
korean_text: 또 포로의 의복을 벗고 네 집에 살며 그 부모를 위하여 한 달 동안 애곡한 후에 네가 그에게로 들어가서 그의 남편이 되고 그는 네 아내가 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: And she shall take off the clothes
and shall remain in your house
and lament her father and her mother
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀의 아버지와 어머니를 슬퍼할 것이며

sentences.original_text: you may go in to her

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀의 남편이 될 수 있으며

sentences.original_text: and she shall be your wife.
